item.title: [tsr] Psychotic Episode
item.description:
Sorcery

Target player reveals their hand and the top card of their library. You choose a card revealed this way. That player puts the chosen card on the bottom of their library.

Madness {1}{B} (If you discard this card, discard it into exile. When you do, cast it for its madness cost or put it into your graveyard.)

item.title: [tsr] Muck Drubb
item.description:
Creature — Beast

Flash (You may cast this spell any time you could cast an instant.)

When Muck Drubb enters the battlefield, change the target of target spell that targets only a single creature to Muck Drubb.

Madness {2}{B} (If you discard this card, discard it into exile. When you do, cast it for its madness cost or put it into your graveyard.)

item.title: [tsr] Skittering Monstrosity
item.description:
Creature — Horror

When you cast a creature spell, sacrifice Skittering Monstrosity.

item.title: [tsr] Sangrophage
item.description:
Creature — Zombie

At the beginning of your upkeep, tap Sangrophage unless you pay 2 life.

item.title: [tsr] Ridged Kusite
item.description:
Creature — Horror Spellshaper

{1}{B}, {T}, Discard a card: Target creature gets +1/+0 and gains first strike until end of turn.

item.title: [tsr] Trespasser il-Vec
item.description:
Creature — Human Rogue

Discard a card: Trespasser il-Vec gains shadow until end of turn. (It can block or be blocked by only creatures with shadow.)

item.title: [tsr] Arc Blade
item.description:
Sorcery

Arc Blade deals 2 damage to any target. Exile Arc Blade with three time counters on it.

Suspend 3—{2}{R} (Rather than cast this card from your hand, you may pay {2}{R} and exile it with three time counters on it. At the beginning of your upkeep, remove a time counter. When the last is removed, cast it without paying its mana cost.)

item.title: [tsr] Needlepeak Spider
item.description:
Creature — Spider

Reach (This creature can block creatures with flying.)

item.title: [tsr] Rift Elemental
item.description:
Creature — Elemental

{1}{R}, Remove a time counter from a permanent you control or suspended card you own: Rift Elemental gets +2/+0 until end of turn.

item.title: [tsr] Primal Forcemage
item.description:
Creature — Elf Shaman

Whenever another creature enters the battlefield under your control, that creature gets +3/+3 until end of turn.

item.title: [tsr] Thornweald Archer
item.description:
Creature — Elf Archer

Reach (This creature can block creatures with flying.)

Deathtouch (Any amount of damage this deals to a creature is enough to destroy it.)

item.title: [tsr] Saffi Eriksdotter
item.description:
Legendary Creature — Human Scout

Sacrifice Saffi Eriksdotter: When target creature is put into your graveyard from the battlefield this turn, return that card to the battlefield.

item.title: [tsr] Paradise Plume
item.description:
Artifact

As Paradise Plume enters the battlefield, choose a color.

Whenever a player casts a spell of the chosen color, you may gain 1 life.

{T}: Add one mana of the chosen color.

item.title: [tsr] Coalition Relic
item.description:
Artifact

{T}: Add one mana of any color.

{T}: Put a charge counter on Coalition Relic.

At the beginning of your precombat main phase, remove all charge counters from Coalition Relic. Add one mana of any color for each charge counter removed this way.

item.title: [tsr] Secret Plans
item.description:
Enchantment

Face-down creatures you control get +0/+1.

Whenever a permanent you control is turned face up, draw a card.

item.title: [tsr] Manifold Key
item.description:
Artifact

{1}, {T}: Untap another target artifact.

{3}, {T}: Target creature can't be blocked this turn.

item.title: [ha4] Think Twice
item.description:
Instant

Draw a card.

Flashback {2}{U} (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)

item.title: [tsr] Sorcerous Spyglass
item.description:
Artifact

As Sorcerous Spyglass enters the battlefield, look at an opponent's hand, then choose any card name.

Activated abilities of sources with the chosen name can't be activated unless they're mana abilities.

item.title: [ha4] Marit Lage's Slumber
item.description:
Legendary Snow Enchantment

Whenever Marit Lage's Slumber or another snow permanent enters the battlefield under your control, scry 1.

At the beginning of your upkeep, if you control ten or more snow permanents, sacrifice Marit Lage's Slumber. If you do, create Marit Lage, a legendary 20/20 black Avatar creature token with flying and indestructible.

item.title: [ha4] Iceberg Cancrix
item.description:
Snow Creature — Crab

Whenever another snow permanent enters the battlefield under your control, you may have target player mill two cards.

item.title: [ha4] Torment of Scarabs
item.description:
Enchantment — Aura Curse

Enchant player

At the beginning of enchanted player's upkeep, that player loses 3 life unless they sacrifice a nonland permanent or discard a card.

item.title: [ha4] Faith of the Devoted
item.description:
Enchantment

Whenever you cycle or discard a card, you may pay {1}. If you do, each opponent loses 2 life and you gain 2 life.

item.title: [ha4] Death's Shadow
item.description:
Creature — Avatar

Death's Shadow gets -X/-X, where X is your life total.

item.title: [ha4] Ammit Eternal
item.description:
Creature — Zombie Crocodile Demon

Afflict 3 (Whenever this creature becomes blocked, defending player loses 3 life.)

Whenever an opponent casts a spell, put a -1/-1 counter on Ammit Eternal.

Whenever Ammit Eternal deals combat damage to a player, remove all -1/-1 counters from it.

item.title: [tsr] Whitemane Lion
item.description:
Creature — Cat

Flash (You may cast this spell any time you could cast an instant.)

When Whitemane Lion enters the battlefield, return a creature you control to its owner's hand.

item.title: [ha4] Harmless Offering
item.description:
Sorcery

Target opponent gains control of target permanent you control.

item.title: [ha4] Goblin Gaveleer
item.description:
Creature — Goblin Warrior

Trample

Goblin Gaveleer gets +2/+0 for each Equipment attached to it.

item.title: [ha4] Flameblade Adept
item.description:
Creature — Jackal Warrior

Menace

Whenever you cycle or discard a card, Flameblade Adept gets +1/+0 until end of turn.

item.title: [tsr] Slipstream Serpent
item.description:
Creature — Serpent

Slipstream Serpent can't attack unless defending player controls an Island.

When you control no Islands, sacrifice Slipstream Serpent.

Morph {5}{U} (You may cast this card face down as a 2/2 creature for {3}. Turn it face up any time for its morph cost.)

item.title: [ha4] Spider Spawning
item.description:
Sorcery

Create a 1/2 green Spider creature token with reach for each creature card in your graveyard.

Flashback {6}{B} (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)

item.title: [ha4] Sawtusk Demolisher
item.description:
Creature — Beast

Mutate {3}{G} (If you cast this spell for its mutate cost, put it over or under target non-Human creature you own. They mutate into the creature on top plus all abilities from under it.)

Trample

Whenever this creature mutates, destroy target noncreature permanent. Its controller creates a 3/3 green Beast creature token.

item.title: [ha4] Lys Alana Huntmaster
item.description:
Creature — Elf Warrior

Whenever you cast an Elf spell, you may create a 1/1 green Elf Warrior creature token.

item.title: [ha4] Hamza, Guardian of Arashin
item.description:
Legendary Creature — Elephant Warrior

This spell costs {1} less to cast for each creature you control with a +1/+1 counter on it.

Creature spells you cast cost {1} less to cast for each creature you control with a +1/+1 counter on it.

item.title: [ha4] Collected Conjuring
item.description:
Sorcery

Exile the top six cards of your library. You may cast up to two sorcery spells with converted mana cost 3 or less from among them without paying their mana costs. Put the exiled cards not cast this way on the bottom of your library in a random order.

item.title: [ha4] Abomination of Llanowar
item.description:
Legendary Creature — Elf Horror

Vigilance; menace (This creature can't be blocked except by two or more creatures.)

Abomination of Llanowar's power and toughness are each equal to the number of Elves you control plus the number of Elf cards in your graveyard.

item.title: [ha4] Bonesplitter
item.description:
Artifact — Equipment

Equipped creature gets +2/+0.

Equip {1}

item.title: [ha4] Sword of Body and Mind
item.description:
Artifact — Equipment

Equipped creature gets +2/+2 and has protection from green and from blue.

Whenever equipped creature deals combat damage to a player, you create a 2/2 green Wolf creature token and that player mills ten cards.

Equip {2}

item.title: [ha4] Inspiring Statuary
item.description:
Artifact

Nonartifact spells you cast have improvise. (Your artifacts can help cast those spells. Each artifact you tap after you're done activating mana abilities pays for {1}.)

item.title: [ha4] Coldsteel Heart
item.description:
Snow Artifact

Coldsteel Heart enters the battlefield tapped.

As Coldsteel Heart enters the battlefield, choose a color.

{T}: Add one mana of the chosen color.

item.title: [ha4] Blinkmoth Nexus
item.description:
Land

{T}: Add {C}.

{1}: Blinkmoth Nexus becomes a 1/1 Blinkmoth artifact creature with flying until end of turn. It's still a land.

{1}, {T}: Target Blinkmoth creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn.

When Contagion Clasp enters the battlefield, put a -1/-1 counter on target creature.

item.description:
Enchantment

Creatures you control have haste.

Whenever a creature with power 4 or greater enters the battlefield under your control, you may draw a card.

item.description:
Land

item.title: [tsr] Lavinia, Azorius Renegade
item.description:
Legendary Creature — Human Soldier

Each opponent can't cast noncreature spells with converted mana cost greater than the number of lands that player controls.

Whenever an opponent casts a spell, if no mana was spent to cast it, counter that spell.

item.description:
Artifact Creature — Insect

{T}: Choose target permanent you control or suspended card you own. If that permanent or card has a time counter on it, you may remove a time counter from it or put another time counter on it.

item.description:
Legendary Creature — Human Wizard

{2}, Exile a nonland card from your hand: Put four time counters on the exiled card. If it doesn't have suspend, it gains suspend. item.title: [tsr] Clockwork Hydra
item.description:
Artifact Creature — Hydra

Clockwork Hydra enters the battlefield with four +1/+1 counters on it.

Whenever Clockwork Hydra attacks or blocks, remove a +1/+1 counter from it. If you do, Clockwork Hydra deals 1 damage to any target.

{T}: Put a +1/+1 counter on Clockwork Hydra.
